Title: Relates to maternal depression screenings
Summary: Relates to maternal depression screenings; requires maternal health care providers providing pre- and postnatal care or pediatric care to the mother's infant to invite the mother to fill out a questionnaire to detect maternal depression.
LawCode: Amd ยง2500-k, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to maternal depression screenings
